body_html:
It could be you should compile with neon optimizations, could be you need to configure the number of threads by passing the config object when creating a session.
…
On Aug 19, 2017 12:28 PM, "Matt Feury" ***@***.***> wrote: I will run those benchmarks later tonight and get back to you. in terms of flags i used to build, i used the build_raspberry_pi.sh directly, which translated into bazel build -c opt --copt=-march=armv6 --copt=-mfpu=vfp \ --copt=-funsafe-math-optimizations --copt=-ftree-vectorize \ --copt=-fomit-frame-pointer --cpu=armeabi \ ***@***.***_config_arm_compiler//:toolchain \ --verbose_failures \ //tensorflow/tools/benchmark:benchmark_model \ //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package — You are receiving this because you were assigned. body_text:
It could be you should compile with neon optimizations, could be you need
to configure the number of threads by passing the config object when
creating a session.
…
On Aug 19, 2017 12:28 PM, "Matt Feury" ***@***.***> wrote:
 I will run those benchmarks later tonight and get back to you. in terms of
 flags i used to build, i used the build_raspberry_pi.sh directly, which
 translated into

 bazel build -c opt --copt=-march=armv6 --copt=-mfpu=vfp \
   --copt=-funsafe-math-optimizations --copt=-ftree-vectorize \
   --copt=-fomit-frame-pointer --cpu=armeabi \
   ***@***.***_config_arm_compiler//:toolchain \
   --verbose_failures \
   //tensorflow/tools/benchmark:benchmark_model \
   //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

 —
 You are receiving this because you were assigned.
 Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
 <#5729 (comment)>,
 or mute the thread
 <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABtim_7Pbmt3mULB0L0E_tTQ0en4yOC7ks5sZzdXgaJpZM4K3eBk>
 .
body:
It could be you should compile with neon optimizations, could be you need
to configure the number of threads by passing the config object when
creating a session.

On Aug 19, 2017 12:28 PM, "Matt Feury" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I will run those benchmarks later tonight and get back to you. in terms of
> flags i used to build, i used the build_raspberry_pi.sh directly, which
> translated into
>
> bazel build -c opt --copt=-march=armv6 --copt=-mfpu=vfp \
>   --copt=-funsafe-math-optimizations --copt=-ftree-vectorize \
>   --copt=-fomit-frame-pointer --cpu=armeabi \
>   --crosstool_top=@local_config_arm_compiler//:toolchain \
>   --verbose_failures \
>   //tensorflow/tools/benchmark:benchmark_model \
>   //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were assigned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/5729#issuecomment-323543044>,
> or mute the thread
